note.p: Death: North Grange, Headingly, Leeds, Yorkshire (13 November 1923)
Education: Winchester College; Brasenose College, Oxford. MA (1855). Studied medicine at King's College, London. MB (Oxford)
Career: Surgeon, Leeds General Infirmary (1864-1884); Lecturer on Surgery, Leeds School of Medicine; Member, General Medical Council; authority on sanitation; his hobby was fishing
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1924 vol 96 pp xxi-xxv, plate, signed by C A
